article:
This list contains a 'list of [[Enzyme Commission number|EC numbers]]' for the
second group, 'EC 2', transferases, placed in numerical order as determined by
the Nomenclature Committee of the International Union of Biochemistry and
Molecular Biology.
headings: EC 2.2: Transferring Aldehyde or Ketonic Groups
EC 2.5: Transferring Alkyl or Aryl Groups, Other than Methyl Groups
EC 2.10: Transferring molybdenum- or tungsten-containing groups
